WRITING.TITLE: Commission I did for a friend. Crit welcome

WRITING.TEXT: Is this a thing yet? I'd be super interested.
Super cool! What software did you use to render it?
Oh awesome! I've heard a lot about maya, is it an easy program to get into?
I love the style!

WRITING.TITLE: One of my favorites I did from inktober

WRITING.TEXT: I have a [Kofi page](https://ko-fi.com/subject2199/gallery) if anyone is interested in a few more.
[Servo-Skull](https://warhammer40k.fandom.com/wiki/Servo-skull). I love em. Oh and check out the list of all the different [Servitors](https://warhammer40k.fandom.com/wiki/Servitor).
Dewit! I also need to draw more.
It wouldn't matter what I charge considering I would never do commissions for homophobes. Seriously, the f slur?
Thank you for the feedback! Yeah I'll definitely put more polish in some areas more than others. I'll make those fixes. Both my friend and I appreciate it :)
I know! I love em too :3
Thank you! It's digital.
Thank you :)
I love it so much. I'm super excited for the mini.
I absolutely love the colors you used. It has such an other worldly atmosphere.
I have an older Wacom tablet, it's been a trooper. The important thing is to calibrate it for pen pressure so the line thickness is controlled just like with a ink pen.
Thank you :)

WRITING.TITLE: When you've been doing the same thing you've been told to every day

WRITING.TEXT: Eyyyyy! #128073; #128073; But seriously I love this song so much.
Thanks!
Haha, awesome.

I'ed suggest starting with a bamboo, or a refurbished model since it'll be fixed and cheaper. Huion is a competitive tablet maker and my friend loves them. They have sales often on Amazon if you want to keep an eye on that.

Yeah, the tablet (no screens) might take a bit to get used to not looking at the drawing, but it doesn't take that long to get it sorted. The resolution and sensitivity is great. Only issue with mine so far is that it's so old (6years) the surface isn't smooth anymore. I need to upgrade probably soon. Can you try them out at an electronic store?
Oh no, I gotta change it then, lol

I wasn't a fan before this song honestly but of course heard their stuff on the radio. Going back and listening to their albums has been a treat. I really want more in the direction with this song and a little more with this character, but that doesn't seem to be their creative style?
Check the return date, if you aren't feeling it in a week you can always refund.

WRITING.TITLE: Variations on a theme of Klarrg

WRITING.TEXT: Haha, dude, I'ed love a lego set.
Nice! Love the detail. Keep drawing and posting!

WRITING.TITLE: Holy Terra burns! Fortify the forests!

WRITING.TEXT: Serve your duty to the Emperor and to Holy Terra by aiding the fortification efforts at r[/Australia](https://www.reddit.com/r/australia/comments/ejqncy/ways_to_donate_fundraise_and_volunteer_this/)!
Thanks :3
Friend just showed me this but [Reapermini's](https://www.reapermini.com/australia) has some koala models that they're selling for fund raising. Not a chapter, but fucking awesome noone the less.
Time to redo all of 40k but with Australian animals.

[Yep](https://media.sciencephoto.com/image/c0179474/800wm/C0179474-Koala_hand.jpg), makes grabbing [trees easier](https://image.shutterstock.com/image-photo/koala-hand-600w-367915661.jpg). The back feet are also [adorable](https://i.pinimg.com/originals/b4/84/e6/b484e625e203db2f3d416b09ed3ae536.jpg)
This is so cool. Love the early biology kinda sketches.

Does the organic bits start having issues with gravity generated from it's own mass? Would the center have to be super dense bone to support it, or would it have some dyson sphere stuff with hollowed chambers near the center and then be mostly flesh and armor near the outsides?
Love the blocky aesthetic

Does this mean it has some organs/cells that can both survive the mariana trench and nearly nothing, our would there be some organs near the center that are suited to high pressure conditions while stuff closer to the surface is adopted for lower pressure? I also assumed these things had some sort of heat, but I have no source for that.

WRITING.TITLE: Holy Terra burns! Fortify the forests!

WRITING.TEXT: yes
No problem! Thanks for caring about art attribution.

WRITING.TITLE: You've heard of Elf on the Shelf, now get ready for
You've heard of Elf on the Shelf, now get ready for
You've heard of Elf on the Shelf, now get ready for

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you!
I didn't know about zoats until the new model was announced on Warhammer Community. I think they have adorable corgi proportions and I like the lore. I kinda gravitate to the weirder stuff.
A 40k dragon ogre.
This was only a napping Zoat.
zoat on a boat, possibly in a moat :)

WRITING.TITLE: You've heard of Zoat on a Boat, now get ready for

WRITING.TEXT: That's a lot but I'll [give it a try](https://www.reddit.com/r/ImaginaryWarhammer/comments/fv59ce/youve_heard_of_zoat_on_a_boat_now_get_ready_for/)
Concept suggested by u/thefungineer
Love your style!
Oh that's hella fun.
I assume like goat but with a z.
Love the grungy style. Orks shouldn't be depicted any other way, cmv.
I won't.
Thanks!
Damn that's so cool
This is somehow incredibly nostalgic even though I don't remember seeing this before. *D #233;j #224; nostalgia*
Love these! Do you have a link to more of your work I can look at and admire?
